review: Used This Mama Earth Newly Launched Onion Oil twice and i must say im already impressed by the results It prevents hair loss helps control premature greying dryness dandruff scalp eruptions and many other hair problems after its regular use To avoid dry and frizzy hair make sure that you use this oil to your hairs twice a week Oiling provides your scalp with essential nutrients and also strengthens the hair roots Mamaearth onion oil works best for your hair during all the seasons

name: Mamaearth-Onion-Growth-Control-Redensyl
review: I have been using this product for some time now My Roommate had this and I had been planning to order for a while now I just used to forget all the time finally I have it now Well from the last 2 months of use here s my experience with the product I use it every night and get a shower in the morning Pros 1 The oil is non greasy and pretty light 2 Has very good smell no pungent or awkward fragrance3 My hair doesn t lump in together as with other hair oil products 4 Gives a pretty good shine and dark color5 It s very helpful for dandruff hairfall hairloss I don t have a very dense hair presence so my scalp was visible all the time Now it looks pretty dense Cons 1 can t find anything at allI do recommend it for people having hairfall issues

name: Mamaearth-Percent-Natural-Berry-Toothpaste
review: My 2 year old child doesn t have cavity but started developing bad breaths the morning after while using this toothpaste for a couple of weeks during day and night brushing sessions I feel this toothpaste might actually cause cavity rather than keep it away from my experience I immediately shifted back to Pigeon toothpaste for night brushing and the bad breath stopped from the next day onward I had purchased it for its all natural properties Mama Earth team needs to research more on the ingredients on this product I use other Mama Earth products and they are decent Not this toothpaste though

clean_review_text: love mamaearth products using since six months looking facewash acne mom stumbled across mamaearth new range face washes products chemical free one really gentle skin comes easy squeezy tube facewash clear like gel tea tree fragrance really helps fighting acne almost two uses mother really impressed must buy anyone fighting acne

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I m editing this review on 11 5 2020 my experience with this product is so disappointing its quality is lower than regular soap for any skin type I don t recommend to buy this not worth for money it just clean your face with water that s all it do it s a scam I bought this product after watching fit YouTubber channel and I wasted my money I say don t go after product that says it s natural it s a big scam not only they don t work on you but they come very very expensive I use home remedies and some regular Market product

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I have sensitive and acne prone skin More than active acne i have scars on my face This face wash shows visible results after 1 usage only It is very gentle on skin has a pleasant and mild fragrance Does not rip off the natural oil from your face leaves your face deeply cleansed and smooth after wash It is complete value for money

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I am writing this review after using it around 20 days It seems very natural and chemical free and is very gentle on skin But it does its job of cleaning the skin properly It contains tea tree which is one of my favourite ingredients for skin care Give it a try its definitely better than all other chemicals containing face washes And its even affordable as compared to other natural brands available in market

review: Though it is pricey but quality comes at a price It is free of chemicals so a healthy option for skin Gives results on acne prone face in 7 8 days Cleanses face very well and quantity required is also less This will b my face wash for years to come

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: This face wash is amazing guys I ve oily skin Every now and then my face breaks out But when I first time used this within 4 wash my pimples were gone I m not jocking guys This face wash does wonders I use it two times daily after waking up in the morning and before going to bed Now I m using it for two months And I don t a single pimple past two months For every oily skin acne prone beauties I ll recommend this facewash

name: Mamaearth-Face-Wash-100-ml
review: I have oily to combination skin During Monsoons my skin becomes even oilier due to humidity and also it becomes more prone to breakouts I have been using this face wash for quite some time now and it works amazing on my skin It extracts the excess oil from my skin and leaves it clean but not dehydrated Also I haven t faced any breakout on my face since I ve started using it

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Mamaearth is always best Every product of this brand is awesome I love all babies products by Mamaearth Best part of this soap is SUITABLE FOR EVERY BABY S DELICATE SKIN even you can try it for your newborns as well I m using it for my baby since birth Quality same as mentioned The natural nutrients present in goat milk gets easily absorbed in the delicate skin of your baby and keeps it moisturized for long time SUITS DRY ITCHY ECZEMA PRONE SKIN as well Best product You can purchase it for your baby or for gifting for your loved ones
clean_review_text: mamaearth always best every product brand awesome love babies products mamaearth best part soap suitable every baby delicate skin even try newborns well using baby since birth quality mentioned natural nutrients present goat milk gets easily absorbed delicate skin baby keeps moisturized long time suits dry itchy eczema prone skin well best product purchase baby gifting loved ones

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Update horrible bathing that I have used so far My 3 year old son developed hives after using the soap and more over it turned him dark Fragrance too strong It literally hits you Will never buy again The bar is ok ok Not so good as it claims I used on my kid and feel it doesn t cleanse well I have a dry skin I used for myself on face and found that my skin is still dry after washing So nothing great about the moisturising part and more over I don t feel fresh after washing my face with this bar Its like I haven t washed my face So I really doubt if it cleanses ur skin
clean_review_text: update horrible bathing used far 3 year old son developed hives using soap turned dark fragrance strong literally hits never buy bar ok ok good claims used kid feel cleanse well dry skin used face found skin still dry washing nothing great moisturising part feel fresh washing face bar like washed face really doubt cleanses ur skin

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Although it makes a very rich and creamy lather it starts melting quickly if kept wet I need to take it out of the bathroom and dry it for the next use as I want to save as much of it as possible because it s costlier than other brands But it does a far better job than other brands and it s organic I m happy to have this soap in my skincare regimen as an adult who has a very sensitive skin prone to irritation The best thing about this soap is it doesn t leave any residue which I m surprised to see Other brands leave a thin film which makes skin feel very slippery and smooth and I don t like that I want my skin to feel naked fresh and not stripped with moisture Mamaearth soap as well as the mamaearth baby wash did an excellent job
clean_review_text: although makes rich creamy lather starts melting quickly kept wet need take bathroom dry next use want save much possible costlier brands far better job brands organic happy soap skincare regimen adult sensitive skin prone irritation best thing soap leave residue surprised see brands leave thin film makes skin feel slippery smooth like want skin feel naked fresh stripped moisture mamaearth soap well mamaearth baby wash excellent job

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: Very bad product worth ZERO star The entire soap turn into a pasty mass after one time use Not worth buying this product as the second day onwards one has to scoop it with hand like a cream and apply on baby Bad manufacturing process for this soap Better they market it in the form of liquid body wash Moreover the soapy feel doesn t go from the body on few rinse Worst than Teddy bar which has similar outcome but better than this Dermadew found to best on my trials to find a good soap for my baby
clean_review_text: bad product worth zero star entire soap turn pasty mass one time use worth buying product second day onwards one scoop hand like cream apply baby bad manufacturing process soap better market form liquid body wash moreover soapy feel go body rinse worst teddy bar similar outcome better dermadew found best trials find good soap baby

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: I avoided the previous negative reviews for this item and trusted mama earth brand but I m sharing this review after 2 weeks of use On 1st day itself I got rashes on my skin but I ignored it Later on my whole face got rashes and small boils My skin became too dry and spotty I used it with mama earth baby cream still my skin was drying out giving me many burns on face I stopped using this item and continued my cetaphil cleansing lotion I will never use mama earth s any product again I threw away the soaps and moisturizer
clean_review_text: avoided previous negative reviews item trusted mama earth brand sharing review 2 weeks use 1st day got rashes skin ignored later whole face got rashes small boils skin became dry spotty used mama earth baby cream still skin drying giving many burns face stopped using item continued cetaphil cleansing lotion never use mama earth product threw away soaps moisturizer

name: Mamaearth-Moisturizing-Baby-Bathing-Oatmeal
review: I really have started appreciating this brand as the product they made really works well and best part is they are made from safe ingredients This baby soap is been enriched with goodness goat milk oatmeal Shea butter and coconut based cleanser The skin of my toddler feels so soft after bath The shape of the soap is perfect for little one to hold as well No tears formula of soap is working great It is very gentle on the skin The fragrance is so amazing I highly recommend this moisturizing bath to all mommies and daddies I specially recommend it for toddlers who are in phase where they want to be independent and bath by themselves

name: Godrej-Direct-Cool-Refrigerator-1905-PTDI
review: My mom s favorite brand is Godrej and my wife choose this model that s why I buy this one Recently received the product from amazon Delivery was good and the Delivery Boy never ask for any money really very good and professional Before buy this I verify the price with local and also Godrej shop s the price of this product is 21600 rupee but in amazon I get this in 16k So my suggestion never buy the product from local shops if you do that then you also pay the extra money for toli vara and delivery charges might be they can give you some extra ice tray but still amazon is best Here some pros and cons I providePros Beautyfull Colorfull look direct cool large vegetables rack Absolute zero noise Cons backside is open can not remove the water store for clean the water Only one ice tray so Ice lover feel sad I had recently get this one so for now this was my review I will again post another review after use of a month Till then stay tune to searching and reading reviews

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: I ve been using this Godrej aer pocket for a couple of years now Yes I understand that the fragrance doesn t last for more than a week It is very strong the first couple of days and rest of the times it is just a light hint of the scent Then the gel eventually crystallizes I figured out a way for a juggad Basically I never take the gel pack out of the plastic cover There is a hole at the top to hang individual packs for store displays that I cut Then with scissors I carefully make 3 slender cuts This makes the scent come out soft and not too powerful It lasts for almost 20 days this way The violet fragrance purple lasts for 25 days with this Hope this review is helpful
clean_review_text: using godrej aer pocket couple years yes understand fragrance last week strong first couple days rest times light hint scent gel eventually crystallizes figured way juggad basically never take gel pack plastic cover hole top hang individual packs store displays cut scissors carefully make 3 slender cuts makes scent come soft powerful lasts almost 20 days way violet fragrance purple lasts 25 days hope review helpful

name: Godrej-aer-Pocket-Bathroom-Fragrance
review: These champs are better considering they are way to different from the Odonil fresheners we have been using for ages it s basic law of diminishing returns I ll encourage you to try them for their fragrance and they are apt for any room in your apartment When newly opened the fragrance is too strong that i would kick you in the face with it but it dissolves when you give it a couple of days Another good part about this is the concept of hanging it I usually do in the fall ceiling of my washrooms and it works pretty well Word of caution Don t expect it to last a month because mine never have Maximum 20 to 22 days and then you ll want to replace it with a new one but if you grab it on a deal on Amazon Pantry it s quite economical
clean_review_text: champs better considering way different odonil fresheners using ages basic law diminishing returns encourage try fragrance apt room apartment newly opened fragrance strong would kick face dissolves give couple days another good part concept hanging usually fall ceiling washrooms works pretty well word caution expect last month mine never maximum 20 22 days want replace new one grab deal amazon pantry quite economical

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: To start off the safe arrived with a Low Battery message meaning that before I could do anything else I had to go and get new batteries for this brand new item Once you get things in order the safe works well and serves its purpose however the manual provided is obsolete and the instructions do not match up with this product There are no solutions posted online either If you want to program the safe you have to figure it out on your own The customer service personnel were not helpful either and they kept trying to force me to get a technician to come to my house at the cost of Rs 500 just to program the device which completely defeats the purpose of online shopping Don t fall for it This is rather ridiculous for such a big brand like Godrej In case anyone else needs to re program their home code here is what I was able to do I hope it works for you too 1 The instructions indicate to press 68 but it actually means 68 Lock If the instructions indicate try pressing Clear2 Every time I pressed 68 I got an error message so I had to go through all the steps listed below 3 Before you can change personal code in home mode you will need to Access The Programming pg 6 The code is 751019 which means that there are 6 different features that you can program Go through all the steps and change the numbers as they suit you When you get to the last digit there are no instructions written in the book so you will have to figure this out on your own If the last digit is 1 change it to 0 or 9 4 After going through the programming and changing the last number you should be able to go back to change the personal code in home mode 5 If you set your password and it doesn t lock go back to the programming again and change the last digit back to what it was originally Good luck
clean_review_text: start safe arrived low battery message meaning could anything else go get new batteries brand new item get things order safe works well serves purpose however manual provided obsolete instructions match product solutions posted online either want program safe figure customer service personnel helpful either kept trying force get technician come house cost rs 500 program device completely defeats purpose online shopping fall rather ridiculous big brand like godrej case anyone else needs program home code able hope works 1 instructions indicate press 68 actually means 68 lock instructions indicate try pressing clear2 every time pressed 68 got error message go steps listed 3 change personal code home mode need access programming pg 6 code 751019 means 6 different features program go steps change numbers suit get last digit instructions written book figure last digit 1 change 0 9 4 going programming changing last number able go back change personal code home mode 5 set password lock go back programming change last digit back originally good luck

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: The product was good But starting it for the first time took me several hours to start and install it properly Here I will list out all steps so that reading this other people might find it helpful 1 Unwrap the package properly Look for any damages 2 You will find a set of keys attached in a plastic sachet 3 Use the key to open the locker There is a white cover near the button panel open it to insert keys 4 Inside the locker you will find the manual and wall mounting knots 5 The other side of the keypad panel will contain the battery space which needs 4 AA batteries for the led to start But before inserting the batteries do see the positive negative marked side and insert the batteries according to the charge respectively 6 Close the battery lid and led will automatically start working The battery lid needs a small screw to get fixed so if u don t find the screw in any plastic packets then use another aftermarket screws or maybe the screw is present inside the locker mechanism 7 The locker mechanism screws can be unlocked by a particular opener which will be given with the mounting knots inside the locker 8 The locker is now ready to use Remove the keys and use the led to unlock and lock it The default password is 1234 9 Please donot apply any pressure or try to press the firm bolts of the locker mechanism when the locker is open Let the motor of the locker do its work 10 If the locker shows any other error message Do consult the user manual Note Please be calm and do things properly or else you might damage the product
clean_review_text: product good starting first time took several hours start install properly list steps reading people might find helpful 1 unwrap package properly look damages 2 find set keys attached plastic sachet 3 use key open locker white cover near button panel open insert keys 4 inside locker find manual wall mounting knots 5 side keypad panel contain battery space needs 4 aa batteries led start inserting batteries see positive negative marked side insert batteries according charge respectively 6 close battery lid led automatically start working battery lid needs small screw get fixed u find screw plastic packets use another aftermarket screws maybe screw present inside locker mechanism 7 locker mechanism screws unlocked particular opener given mounting knots inside locker 8 locker ready use remove keys use led unlock lock default password 1234 9 please donot apply pressure try press firm bolts locker mechanism locker open let motor locker work 10 locker shows error message consult user manual note please calm things properly else might damage product

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: I love this digital safe locker Now I can put all my important stuff inside this box The good thing is that it is not that bulky The material is also very good seems very strong and heavy And It is very easy to install I have not mounted fixed it because I put this inside the almera Now I can feel safer by keeping cash passport and other valuable stuff Lookwise also it just has a classy touch It has a proper colored LED display It works on the battery power and the consumption is very low You can set your own passcode from the 4 8 digits I like it beep sound whenever you have to press the keys In addition it also has 2 emergency keys Overall now I am very calm ever since this digital safe has been arrived Of course now I can manage my things for my own peace of mind according to my needs Earlier I never ever used such kind of digital safe but after have been started using this I found this as exactly as what I expected for Truly it s a big value for money I would highly recommend this product to everyone who read this review Greets Please click the Helpful button if you like this review Thank you

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: To start off the safe arrived with a Low Battery message meaning that before I could do anything else I had to go and get new batteries for this brand new item Once you get things in order the safe works well and serves its purpose however the manual provided is obsolete and the instructions do not match up with this product There are no solutions posted online either If you want to program the safe you have to figure it out on your own The customer service personnel were not helpful either and they kept trying to force me to get a technician to come to my house at the cost of Rs 500 just to program the device which completely defeats the purpose of online shopping Don t fall for it This is rather ridiculous for such a big brand like Godrej In case anyone else needs to re program their home code here is what I was able to do I hope it works for you too 1 The instructions indicate to press 68 but it actually means 68 Lock If the instructions indicate try pressing Clear2 Every time I pressed 68 I got an error message so I had to go through all the steps listed below 3 Before you can change personal code in home mode you will need to Access The Programming pg 6 The code is 751019 which means that there are 6 different features that you can program Go through all the steps and change the numbers as they suit you When you get to the last digit there are no instructions written in the book so you will have to figure this out on your own If the last digit is 1 change it to 0 or 9 4 After going through the programming and changing the last number you should be able to go back to change the personal code in home mode 5 If you set your password and it doesn t lock go back to the programming again and change the last digit back to what it was originally Good luck
clean_review_text: start safe arrived low battery message meaning could anything else go get new batteries brand new item get things order safe works well serves purpose however manual provided obsolete instructions match product solutions posted online either want program safe figure customer service personnel helpful either kept trying force get technician come house cost rs 500 program device completely defeats purpose online shopping fall rather ridiculous big brand like godrej case anyone else needs program home code able hope works 1 instructions indicate press 68 actually means 68 lock instructions indicate try pressing clear2 every time pressed 68 got error message go steps listed 3 change personal code home mode need access programming pg 6 code 751019 means 6 different features program go steps change numbers suit get last digit instructions written book figure last digit 1 change 0 9 4 going programming changing last number able go back change personal code home mode 5 set password lock go back programming change last digit back originally good luck

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: The product was good But starting it for the first time took me several hours to start and install it properly Here I will list out all steps so that reading this other people might find it helpful 1 Unwrap the package properly Look for any damages 2 You will find a set of keys attached in a plastic sachet 3 Use the key to open the locker There is a white cover near the button panel open it to insert keys 4 Inside the locker you will find the manual and wall mounting knots 5 The other side of the keypad panel will contain the battery space which needs 4 AA batteries for the led to start But before inserting the batteries do see the positive negative marked side and insert the batteries according to the charge respectively 6 Close the battery lid and led will automatically start working The battery lid needs a small screw to get fixed so if u don t find the screw in any plastic packets then use another aftermarket screws or maybe the screw is present inside the locker mechanism 7 The locker mechanism screws can be unlocked by a particular opener which will be given with the mounting knots inside the locker 8 The locker is now ready to use Remove the keys and use the led to unlock and lock it The default password is 1234 9 Please donot apply any pressure or try to press the firm bolts of the locker mechanism when the locker is open Let the motor of the locker do its work 10 If the locker shows any other error message Do consult the user manual Note Please be calm and do things properly or else you might damage the product

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-SEEC9060-Electronic
review: I love this digital safe locker Now I can put all my important stuff inside this box The good thing is that it is not that bulky The material is also very good seems very strong and heavy And It is very easy to install I have not mounted fixed it because I put this inside the almera Now I can feel safer by keeping cash passport and other valuable stuff Lookwise also it just has a classy touch It has a proper colored LED display It works on the battery power and the consumption is very low You can set your own passcode from the 4 8 digits I like it beep sound whenever you have to press the keys In addition it also has 2 emergency keys Overall now I am very calm ever since this digital safe has been arrived Of course now I can manage my things for my own peace of mind according to my needs Earlier I never ever used such kind of digital safe but after have been started using this I found this as exactly as what I expected for Truly it s a big value for money I would highly recommend this product to everyone who read this review Greets Please click the Helpful button if you like this review Thank you

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: The product is good The only caveat as I have noticed so far is to be careful with the alarm Don t keep stuff on it after switching the alarm on Second I think the alarm tone itself should change It needs to be ALARMING The volume needs to be a bit on the higher side as well One can easily muffle the sound with a blanket type of fabric and make a getaway That said it is quite a sleek gadget Definitely worth more than what one would be paying for It s a bit heavy but I guess that needs to be part of the package so to speak
clean_review_text: product good caveat noticed far careful alarm keep stuff switching alarm second think alarm tone change needs alarming volume needs bit higher side well one easily muffle sound blanket type fabric make getaway said quite sleek gadget definitely worth one would paying bit heavy guess needs part package speak

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: This is very handy and useful I keep it inside my wardrobe and store my wallet car key and other loose currency and change in it when I come back from office So no more carelessly placed wallet risking small stealing by maid As I got the wardrobe made recently I got a specially designed compartment to keep this safe It works flawlessly and is very easy to operate If I want to lock all the other wardrobes at home while going out somewhere I keep the keys inside this no need to carry so many keys with me One needs to know the purpose of this safe and the way to use it
clean_review_text: handy useful keep inside wardrobe store wallet car key loose currency change come back office carelessly placed wallet risking small stealing maid got wardrobe made recently got specially designed compartment keep safe works flawlessly easy operate want lock wardrobes home going somewhere keep keys inside need carry many keys one needs know purpose safe way use

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Using it since November 2016 Sleek and elegant Sits nicely in my cupboard Useful to keep certain small sized valuables like keys cash jewelry certain documents watches etc The touch panel is great feels soft and is responsive Velvet lining is great Portable Only con I found is that it buzzez even if you close the cupboard door a bit hard Other than that Its good to have it Note Its not a regular heavy duty safe Its more of a personal locker as mentioned Don t expect it to be the most secure thing you can have
clean_review_text: using since november 2016 sleek elegant sits nicely cupboard useful keep certain small sized valuables like keys cash jewelry certain documents watches etc touch panel great feels soft responsive velvet lining great portable con found buzzez even close cupboard door bit hard good note regular heavy duty safe personal locker mentioned expect secure thing

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Bought godrej goldilock in the Amazon diwali sale In The product that I got was having some scratches already Still I kept it I wanted to disable the theft alarm because it gives a loud sound even if we move the goldilock slightly which is very annoying I tried to disable the feature but it was not getting disabled The godrej executive also couldn t do it He told some problem is there in pcb and I should return the product I did it I got the product replaced by Amazon the very next day Now the new product also has same problem We cannot disable the alarm Also it has one additional problem when we close its lid it sometimes doesn t get locked After 2 3 attempts it gets locked Now I am confused what to do with this I trusted godrej brand and Amazon But the satisfaction level is not at all there
clean_review_text: bought godrej goldilock amazon diwali sale product got scratches already still kept wanted disable theft alarm gives loud sound even move goldilock slightly annoying tried disable feature getting disabled godrej executive also told problem pcb return product got product replaced amazon next day new product also problem cannot disable alarm also one additional problem close lid sometimes get locked 2 3 attempts gets locked confused trusted godrej brand amazon satisfaction level

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Awesome packaging done by amazon Product review Pros 1 Easy to Carry 2 Touch screen is absolutely smooth 3 Working mini safe with a primitive touch screen run by a 9 volt battery well that is awesome 4 Developers and Designers have done a great job in creating a sleek and stylish safe Cons 1 Although the safe looks great not much space to place enough valuables If u place a mobile wallet and a wristwatch space is done for 2 Inner layer of the safe is made by a grossest material It s so rough that it can scratch the back side of your iphone if haven t placed carefully 3 Wiring for this safe can be done better 4 Default battery provided to you will be a GP 9 volt alkaline battery Mine was pretty much messySo to sum this up a fine product for occasional use routine if you are thrifty enough to spend bucks on batteries with a stylish look
clean_review_text: awesome packaging done amazon product review pros 1 easy carry 2 touch screen absolutely smooth 3 working mini safe primitive touch screen run 9 volt battery well awesome 4 developers designers done great job creating sleek stylish safe cons 1 although safe looks great much space place enough valuables u place mobile wallet wristwatch space done 2 inner layer safe made grossest material rough scratch back side iphone placed carefully 3 wiring safe done better 4 default battery provided gp 9 volt alkaline battery mine pretty much messyso sum fine product occasional use routine thrifty enough spend bucks batteries stylish look

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: I recently gifted this item to my parents on their anniversary However the product is good and easy to use with a very responsive touch panel it has to be absolutely stationary else the alarm sets off which makes it difficult to carry during transportation Also the Godrej support team is not quick in answering your queries and I received a product which had few scratches on it So Amazon should ensure that the product appears brand new since the customers are paying them for a brand new product Overall it s worth buying for your security needs
clean_review_text: recently gifted item parents anniversary however product good easy use responsive touch panel absolutely stationary else alarm sets makes difficult carry transportation also godrej support team quick answering queries received product scratches amazon ensure product appears brand new since customers paying brand new product overall worth buying security needs

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: Product Is Excellent but the packaging was really terrible I was shocked to see the box damaged like it was thrown in the warehouse or something luckily the product was in mint condition The locker is very very useful when you have domestic help around this locker shall actually keep you stress free the locker is very easy to operate during day or night due to led backlit number which are illuminated overall a great buy wish Amazon improves the packaging on this product in the future
clean_review_text: product excellent packaging really terrible shocked see box damaged like thrown warehouse something luckily product mint condition locker useful domestic help around locker shall actually keep stress free locker easy operate day night due led backlit number illuminated overall great buy wish amazon improves packaging product future

name: Godrej-Security-Solutions-Goldilocks-Personal
review: If you have maids in the house and want to keep valuables like wallets and regular use small jewellery under lock and key while they go about their household chores and you don t want to carry physical keys either for fear of misplacing and searching for them or simply inconvenient for you then this is the product to go for It s small enough to sit on your study table or fit in your cupboard drawer although you must understand That it can t fit more than 3 or 4 regular size men s wallets and some other knickknacks like ear rings chains cards etc Easy to operate and install by reading instructions in manual Sturdy enough to dissuade servants from physical tampering Serves purpose for what it is intended to do
clean_review_text: maids house want keep valuables like wallets regular use small jewellery lock key go household chores want carry physical keys either fear misplacing searching simply inconvenient product go small enough sit study table fit cupboard drawer although must understand fit 3 4 regular size men wallets knickknacks like ear rings chains cards etc easy operate install reading instructions manual sturdy enough dissuade servants physical tampering serves purpose intended

review: I just love the 2 minute noodle Pros 1 Broken during delivery or not doesnt really matter to me since I prefer to break them into 2 pieces anyways before I cook them2 This family big pack really is cost effective 3 Nestle maggi has been around for so many decades from my childhood and they have been consistent and have even braved the recent questions raised on the quality of their product 4 Masala taste is ever so tasty5 Cooks really fast ok not 2 let s say 5mins Cons 1 Though maggi comes with atta noodles healthier than this maggi the atta maggi is quiet expensive than this normal maggi How I wish the oats and atta maggi would have been cheaper too

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: It s literally heavenly feeling to taste this chocolate The chocolate is bitter to the core It has no added suger Sugery chocolate fake chocolate lovers won t like it It s for those people who has developed taste for cocoa cacao over the period of time It s made for chocolate connoisseur Price is very less when compare to other brands in market Plus Amul is well known brand itself Packaging was nice

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste not sure if people consider this bitter I personally do not feel so may be very mildly But the cocoa taste flavor indeed feels great I had earlier tasted upto 90 dark among the Amul chocolates of course couple of other makes including Lindt In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul s progression in a way starting at 55 then 75 90 and now 99 in fact love the whole range by Amul As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates Thanks Amul In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99 dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged thanks to the seller Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature pretty cool so no melting problem or anything for me So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube or sometimes two after each meal enjoyable in taste and so sugar no guilt
clean_review_text: simply love pure cocoa taste sure people consider bitter personally feel may mildly cocoa taste flavor indeed feels great earlier tasted upto 90 dark among amul chocolates course couple makes including lindt fact graduated darkness amul progression way starting 55 75 90 99 fact love whole range amul long range available never look beyond dark chocolates thanks amul fact earlier occasion purchased 99 dark make like flavor strangely kind sourish smell far bit hesitant item well first another thing chocolates delivered superbly packaged thanks seller carton box outside inside chocolate packs layer kind gel filled plastic bags keep chocolates non melting temperature pretty cool melting problem anything would daily dose dark chocolate like cube sometimes two meal enjoyable taste sugar guilt

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: So basically this is not the chocolate for everyone At first when I tasted it I badly regretted buying it It tasted nowhere near the chocolate you would find in the market There isn t even the slightest hint of any kind of sweetness in it and most people would find it gross But the more I ate it the more I could feel it s richness and realised how decadent it is It s not a chocolate it s THE chocolate

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: Amul 99 cacao is the best dark bitter chocolate available in India excellent innovation by Amul I may tell that I am not endorsing Amul or any other brand just my own opinions It has been proven that cacao is one of the healthiest superfoods on earth with amazing health benefits It s full of antioxidants flavonoids which increase lifespan It s one of the highest sources of nitric oxide which dilates widens relaxes blood vessels of the body by reducing blockages thereby supporting heart brain health Cacao is also anti inflammatory and anti carcinogenic thus reduces cancer risk Moreover cacao is a natural blood thinner so can prevent blood clots reduce blood cholesterol blood sugar and lower blood pressure Overall Amul dark cacao chocolate has enormous health benefits so we must be thankful to Amul for making such an awesome health food Please ignore the negative and one star rated reviews as those people are ignorant and lack awareness Requesting all the sugar lovers please don t defame such a nice and healthy product by giving negative ratings and one star I pity those innocent sweet toothed people which focus on tongue taste rather than general health Again I am not promoting Amul company or a representative of the same these are my personal views experience Those who want to enhance quality of life and reduce onset of lifestyle genetic diseases like cancer diabetes hypertension stroke heart attacks cardiac arrest etc must not think twice just purchase the stuff enjoy Infact Amul 99 Cacao Chocolate is a heavenly bliss with irresistible taste It is indeed Delightful Ambrosial I am giving a five star rating to this authentic product if there were 10 stars I would have given full 10 10 Lastly thanks to Amul Amazon too for providing such a nice superfood at my doorstep

name: Amul-Cacao-Chocolate-125g-Pack
review: I simply love this pure cocoa taste not sure if people consider this bitter I personally do not feel so may be very mildly But the cocoa taste flavor indeed feels great I had earlier tasted upto 90 dark among the Amul chocolates of course couple of other makes including Lindt In fact I have graduated in darkness with Amul s progression in a way starting at 55 then 75 90 and now 99 in fact love the whole range by Amul As long as this range is available I will never have to look beyond for Dark chocolates Thanks Amul In fact on an earlier occasion I had purchased 99 dark of some other make and did not like the flavor at all strangely it had kind of a sourish smell and so far a bit hesitant with this item as well at first Another thing the chocolates were delivered superbly packaged thanks to the seller Had a carton box outside and inside of it the chocolate packs had a layer of some kind of gel filled plastic bags to keep the chocolates at non melting temperature pretty cool so no melting problem or anything for me So this would be my daily dose of dark chocolate from now on like a cube or sometimes two after each meal enjoyable in taste and so sugar no guilt

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: This product from patanjali can be a nightmare for your skin Although the fragrance is good and it is a cheap product but that s all I have normal skin and am not very prone to pimples But after applying this gel for a couple of days I started having pimples on my face First I ignored thinking it could be a result of the weather But then the pimples started increasing I immediately discontinued the product But still I am unable to get rid of the pimples
clean_review_text: product patanjali nightmare skin although fragrance good cheap product normal skin prone pimples applying gel couple days started pimples face first ignored thinking could result weather pimples started increasing immediately discontinued product still unable get rid pimples

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I use this gel as my night cream and I am quite happy with it It doesn t make me a beauty queen overnight but moisturizes my skin the non intrusive way and thats what I need The impact is for a short time as it would naturally be Its a good replenishment especially in summers Only thing I think they can improve is change the packaging and use a bit high quality one The cap is quite sharp to open and close This can hurt if not operated carefully Secondly its a tube You usually habitually keep the tube inverted with cap down to take out the gel When you open with cap down the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk throwing some of gel around wasting as well as messing things around at times I now open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out I learnt after some messes This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel
clean_review_text: use gel night cream quite happy make beauty queen overnight moisturizes skin non intrusive way thats need impact short time would naturally good replenishment especially summers thing think improve change packaging use bit high quality one cap quite sharp open close hurt operated carefully secondly tube usually habitually keep tube inverted cap take gel open cap hard cap thick gel work conjunction opens jerk throwing gel around wasting well messing things around times open cap cap top invert tube take learnt messes much careful patanjali sure needs work packaging front gel

review: This product from patanjali can be a nightmare for your skin Although the fragrance is good and it is a cheap product but that s all I have normal skin and am not very prone to pimples But after applying this gel for a couple of days I started having pimples on my face First I ignored thinking it could be a result of the weather But then the pimples started increasing I immediately discontinued the product But still I am unable to get rid of the pimples

name: Patanjali-Saundarya-Aloe-Vera-150ml
review: I use this gel as my night cream and I am quite happy with it It doesn t make me a beauty queen overnight but moisturizes my skin the non intrusive way and thats what I need The impact is for a short time as it would naturally be Its a good replenishment especially in summers Only thing I think they can improve is change the packaging and use a bit high quality one The cap is quite sharp to open and close This can hurt if not operated carefully Secondly its a tube You usually habitually keep the tube inverted with cap down to take out the gel When you open with cap down the hard cap and not so thick gel work in conjunction and it opens with a jerk throwing some of gel around wasting as well as messing things around at times I now open the cap with cap on top and then invert the tube to take it out I learnt after some messes This is too much to be careful about and Patanjali sure needs to work on the packaging front of this gel
clean_review_text: use gel night cream quite happy make beauty queen overnight moisturizes skin non intrusive way thats need impact short time would naturally good replenishment especially summers thing think improve change packaging use bit high quality one cap quite sharp open close hurt operated carefully secondly tube usually habitually keep tube inverted cap take gel open cap hard cap thick gel work conjunction opens jerk throwing gel around wasting well messing things around times open cap cap top invert tube take learnt messes much careful patanjali sure needs work packaging front gel

review: You might think you would buy a refill instead of a new bottle to save money or even reduce plastic use However do not buy this refill It is not the original dettol handwash As soon as i refilled bottle and started using i noticed first color is lighter Noticeably lighter Then i noticed that the scent is very faint compared to original one from bottle I ignored it because in times like these you cant be picky Then two days later i noticed my skin peeling off like it never has before I have used handwash for a long time it has never happened to me I wouldn t even risk givin this pack away to someone for free because it is awful So it will end up in dustbin

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: I have two small kids at home and they are continuously falling ill these days So I bought Dettol disinfected spray last week and very much satisfied with it It has a very nice and mild scented fragrance I tried it inside my car washroom and kids room as well It leaves the place very fresh and nice Although there is no way to check whether it kills the germs or not but still I think it worth to try once All the freshners which I had tried before came with very hard scented and irritating smell But this is very mild and soothing One should give it a try for sure as it is pocket friendly too

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Was looking for a good disinfectant spray as I have toddlers and keeping them safe from flu and virus is really tough So while browsing Dettol caught my eye and without a second thought got it It has mild scent and really easy to use It evaporates in 15 20 seconds and so saves time I Use it when I go out especially in public toilets So convenient and travel friendly Will definitely recommend

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Alcohol content is only 57 whereas I was given to understand its 72 The Amazon listing does not mention alcohol content which is very important as anything less than 60 is ineffective to kill viruses like Covid 19 Ideally should be 70 alcohol for it to be totally effective

name: Dettol-Multi-Purpose-Disinfectant-Surfaces-Original
review: Dettol Surface Disinfectant Spray is good for killing germs But few points are worth noting 1 New spray bottle comes with a cap whereas old bottle comes without cap which is discontinued by dettol 2 Most of the material inside is gas very less quantity of alcohol 3 New spray pump has very less spray power too weak when compared to old one 4 Dettol is widely used by people inspite of the fact that it comes with 60 alcohol whereas other brands like savlon comes with 62 alcohol 5 Fragrance is strong 6 Cap is not properly fitted and comes off very easily

name: Savlon-After-Shave-Lotion-1000
review: Was waiting for a long long time to get my hands on this post pandemic It s still very difficult to find in local stores or any other online shops and finally it s now available on Amazon Extreme useful and versatile liquid to have at home which can be used for first aids bathing shaving disinfecting clothes or even for floor cleaning Do dilute the liquid as per the instructions mentioned on the product label It contains Chlorhexidine Gluconate Solution I P 1 5 v v and strong Cetrimide Solution B P equivalent to Cetrimide I P 3 0 w v to provide antiseptic and disinfectant properties This duo not only more effective than Dettol s Original Brown liquid Chloroxylenol but also doesn t sting after applying on skin There s also now a Multipurpose Disinfectant cleaner from Savlon to compete against Dettol s Multipurpose Liquid Green Blue bottle which is more suitable as disinfectant if you want nice fragrance but also a lot more expensive https www amazon in dp B08CL5P72J stick to this Original Savlon if you don t want much fragrance

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Very effective Active ingredients are quaternary ammonium chloride compounds which are a very potent and effective disinfectant you can find these in most non bleach disinfectant solutions This is not the same as Dettol antiseptic used for skin so do not use it for that purpose I am glad that Dettol introduced this as it was difficult to find purpose made disinfectant concentrates of this formulation the alternative was Amway Pursue which is not only much more expensive but would involve the hassle of dealing with a pushy Amway salesperson Anyways this one has a strong menthol smell and a highly effective disinfectant so fantastic for household use Also works for laundry but use it as a pre wash with a full wash cycle afterwards to clean out any residues Also a word of caution with this and any other disinfectants please use it wisely and not indiscriminately as overuse not only can damage the environment but kill of beneficial microorganisms and cause harmful ones to develop resistance
clean_review_text: effective active ingredients quaternary ammonium chloride compounds potent effective disinfectant find non bleach disinfectant solutions dettol antiseptic used skin use purpose glad dettol introduced difficult find purpose made disinfectant concentrates formulation alternative amway pursue much expensive would involve hassle dealing pushy amway salesperson anyways one strong menthol smell highly effective disinfectant fantastic household use also works laundry use pre wash full wash cycle afterwards clean residues also word caution disinfectants please use wisely indiscriminately overuse damage environment kill beneficial microorganisms cause harmful ones develop resistance

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: This is one of the best disinfectant I have ever used It has a strong menthol smell which I just love This is a multipurpose liquid which can be used to clean laundry wipe the floor used while shaving to cleanse the razor kitchen and bathroom cleaning can be added to bathing water while taking a bath those who don t mind menthol smell Mind you this is not the good old detail antiseptic liquid which comes with the clear bottle and green cap which is handy for cuts and wounds This is an disinfectant liquid used for household cleaning I use this in the washing machine along with the normal liquid detergent and let me tell you my clothes smell amazing after wash I would recommend you all to try this if you like strong menthol smell I just love it 5 stars for the product
clean_review_text: one best disinfectant ever used strong menthol smell love multipurpose liquid used clean laundry wipe floor used shaving cleanse razor kitchen bathroom cleaning added bathing water taking bath mind menthol smell mind good old detail antiseptic liquid comes clear bottle green cap handy cuts wounds disinfectant liquid used household cleaning use washing machine along normal liquid detergent let tell clothes smell amazing wash would recommend try like strong menthol smell love 5 stars product

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: Very effective Active ingredients are quaternary ammonium chloride compounds which are a very potent and effective disinfectant you can find these in most non bleach disinfectant solutions This is not the same as Dettol antiseptic used for skin so do not use it for that purpose I am glad that Dettol introduced this as it was difficult to find purpose made disinfectant concentrates of this formulation the alternative was Amway Pursue which is not only much more expensive but would involve the hassle of dealing with a pushy Amway salesperson Anyways this one has a strong menthol smell and a highly effective disinfectant so fantastic for household use Also works for laundry but use it as a pre wash with a full wash cycle afterwards to clean out any residues Also a word of caution with this and any other disinfectants please use it wisely and not indiscriminately as overuse not only can damage the environment but kill of beneficial microorganisms and cause harmful ones to develop resistance
clean_review_text: effective active ingredients quaternary ammonium chloride compounds potent effective disinfectant find non bleach disinfectant solutions dettol antiseptic used skin use purpose glad dettol introduced difficult find purpose made disinfectant concentrates formulation alternative amway pursue much expensive would involve hassle dealing pushy amway salesperson anyways one strong menthol smell highly effective disinfectant fantastic household use also works laundry use pre wash full wash cycle afterwards clean residues also word caution disinfectants please use wisely indiscriminately overuse damage environment kill beneficial microorganisms cause harmful ones develop resistance

name: Dettol-Disinfectant-Liquid-Menthol-Cool
review: This is one of the best disinfectant I have ever used It has a strong menthol smell which I just love This is a multipurpose liquid which can be used to clean laundry wipe the floor used while shaving to cleanse the razor kitchen and bathroom cleaning can be added to bathing water while taking a bath those who don t mind menthol smell Mind you this is not the good old detail antiseptic liquid which comes with the clear bottle and green cap which is handy for cuts and wounds This is an disinfectant liquid used for household cleaning I use this in the washing machine along with the normal liquid detergent and let me tell you my clothes smell amazing after wash I would recommend you all to try this if you like strong menthol smell I just love it 5 stars for the product

review: I really had liked the packing of this soap But more than that I remember as soon as I had unpacked it the surprising fresh smell coming from it was amazing The soap foam feels soft rich and white It moisturizes the skin perfectly I have an oily skin so I wanted a soap which can balance the skin moisture not over moisturizing not drying out the skin And this soap pretty much does that Also it lasts for a good time also most soaps give up their foaming capability as soon as they become small but this one still gives great lather Would recommend to everyone

name: Cinthol-Cool-Soap-100g-Free
review: After blindly using this soap for years it suddenly struck me that there is zero cooling effect in this soap now and by now I mean 2 3 years I started using cinthol cool 6 7 years ago as a kid when I used to think how awesome is this soap with that tingling cooling after sensation I felt that this soap is way underrated because of that and the signature smell of it But now I have realised that the cooling part is ZERO And the fragrance is bland and doesn t last long Either this soap is fake because I ve been continuously ordering this soap online in saver pack of 4 5 soaps from Amazon but the seller being a trusty one at that or Godrej has changed the chemical composition of this soap Either Godrej should bring a stronger version of cinthol cool soap or I should look for better alternatives because this soap isn t what it used to be once
clean_review_text: blindly using soap years suddenly struck zero cooling effect soap mean 2 3 years started using cinthol cool 6 7 years ago kid used think awesome soap tingling cooling sensation felt soap way underrated signature smell realised cooling part zero fragrance bland last long either soap fake continuously ordering soap online saver pack 4 5 soaps amazon seller trusty one godrej changed chemical composition soap either godrej bring stronger version cinthol cool soap look better alternatives soap used

review: After blindly using this soap for years it suddenly struck me that there is zero cooling effect in this soap now and by now I mean 2 3 years I started using cinthol cool 6 7 years ago as a kid when I used to think how awesome is this soap with that tingling cooling after sensation I felt that this soap is way underrated because of that and the signature smell of it But now I have realised that the cooling part is ZERO And the fragrance is bland and doesn t last long Either this soap is fake because I ve been continuously ordering this soap online in saver pack of 4 5 soaps from Amazon but the seller being a trusty one at that or Godrej has changed the chemical composition of this soap Either Godrej should bring a stronger version of cinthol cool soap or I should look for better alternatives because this soap isn t what it used to be once

review: This is not the same product as advertised I received a Steax Vitariche gloss serum instead of Streax pro Vitagloss as the product name suggests Called CS to get the refund and since i had closed my bank account since the order was placed i wanted the refund to come through amazon pay However Amazon rep Aniket and the supervisor Krishna were absolutely unhelpful and went against common sense to keep telling me that the refund will only be processed to the closed bank account and the bank will issue me a DD When i called them out on their lack of common sense they kept repeating themselves Finally decided to give away the product than to deal with Amazon for a refund This shows how base Amazon s customer service is and a good sign for all to avoid using Amazon if you value your money and time

name: Streax-Hair-Serum-Gloss-100ml
review: I ve used this serum on my normal hair and chemically straightened hair as well as seen results on colored hair And honestly at this price it never disappointed me Though the texture is quite thin compared to a lot of other hair serums but I like how it does not feel heavy on my hair and just a pump of it is enough to dab on my medium length hair This does the basic job of a hair serum from detangling to providing moisture to the ends of the hair and since it goes a long way so thumbs up from my side And to my surprise the new variant vitariche gloss is way better than the previous one and this comes with nutty fragrance which I totally love

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos Coming to this product let me review as under Pros 1 Gives good color highlights if kept for about 45 minutes note 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair 2 The color stays for about 8 9 months and lightens with time 3 After about 1 1 5 months of applying this hair color I would suggest to use henna mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs which will not only nourish your hair but also give very good result for highlighted hairs 4 Personal tip If you are not satisfied with colored highlighted hair and want to remove it use anti dandruff shampoo 3 4 times while washing your hair Also the Godrej hair dye black available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights Cons 1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results note if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more I would suggest 3 sachets 2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair 3 Just like any other chemical hair color it damages you hair and makes your hair rough Verdict It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color highlight your hair at home I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results If you find my review helpful please click the YES HELPFUL button
clean_review_text: someone like always fancied upon getting hair getting coloured see people colored highlighted hair going parlor salon always hard budget living working middle class family finally decided get 2 packets hair highlighter research surfing various youtube videos coming product let review pros 1 gives good color highlights kept 45 minutes note 30 minutes enough dark black hair 2 color stays 8 9 months lightens time 3 1 1 5 months applying hair color would suggest use henna mehendi 1 hour hairs nourish hair also give good result highlighted hairs 4 personal tip satisfied colored highlighted hair want remove use anti dandruff shampoo 3 4 times washing hair also godrej hair dye black available powder sachet also effective removing highlights cons 1 one sachet enough even short hair purchase 2 sachets want proper results note girl shoulder length hair would suggest 3 sachets 2 give much highlighted effect want get noticed others normal hair 3 like chemical hair color damages hair makes hair rough verdict ok give try want color highlight hair home would rather suggest spending bucks get hair highlighted parlor salon better results find review helpful please click yes helpful button

name: Streax-Ultralights-Highlighting-Kit-Collection
review: Its a nightmare Trust me I stuck to each and every direction written on the leaflet and after almost 2 hours of blonder shampoo color shampoo routine my entire hair turned orange That too not a funky orange Just the badly done henna orange if you know what I mean I have tried blue and green and blonde hair color previously semi permanent and permanent but never did I think that a safe color like cappucino brown will turn out to be such a disaster Had to order another color just to cover this mess up Frantically searching for scarfs andhats right now

review: Someone like me had always fancied upon getting some of my hair getting coloured when I see some people with colored or highlighted hair Going to parlor or salon has always been hard on budget if you are living in a working middle class family Finally I decided to get 2 packets of this hair highlighter after doing some research and surfing various Youtube videos Coming to this product let me review as under Pros 1 Gives good color highlights if kept for about 45 minutes note 30 minutes is not enough if you have dark black hair 2 The color stays for about 8 9 months and lightens with time 3 After about 1 1 5 months of applying this hair color I would suggest to use henna mehendi for about 1 hour in all you hairs which will not only nourish your hair but also give very good result for highlighted hairs 4 Personal tip If you are not satisfied with colored highlighted hair and want to remove it use anti dandruff shampoo 3 4 times while washing your hair Also the Godrej hair dye black available in powder sachet is also effective in removing the highlights Cons 1 One sachet is not enough even for short hair Purchase 2 sachets if you want proper results note if you are a girl with shoulder length hair or more I would suggest 3 sachets 2 Does not give too much highlighted effect if you want to get noticed from others with normal hair 3 Just like any other chemical hair color it damages you hair and makes your hair rough Verdict It is ok to give this a try once if you want to color highlight your hair at home I would rather suggest spending few bucks and get your hair highlighted in parlor or salon for better results If you find my review helpful please click the YES HELPFUL button

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: Initially I thought this face wash is waste of money as it doesn t lather at all but used it for a month anyways I have started noticing a lot of difference in my skin This made my skin very soft n all the dry patches I had on my face have reduced as this doesn t dry your skin rather hydrate your skin along with cleaning it Best face wash for people with sensitive n dry skin
clean_review_text: initially thought face wash waste money lather used month anyways started noticing lot difference skin made skin soft n dry patches face reduced dry skin rather hydrate skin along cleaning best face wash people sensitive n dry skin

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml
review: First impression lathers very poorly It s like applying lotion and washing it off But well lack of foam doesn t necessarily mean it s not cleaning my skin Second impression after washing mmm skin does feel better will try using it againFinal impression after using it some more Very good It really does moisturize your skin Perfect for dry skin specially in harsh winter I ve very dry and sensitive skin so i need a very good moisturising skin care routine specially in winter months My sensitive skin does not agree with random products bought off the shelf I tried this in 100ml tube as it s herbal and I liked as it really does moisturize my dry skin so I bought this 200ml pack from Amazon I removed a star though as it s outlet is so big a very generous amount plops out in single pump and you end up finishing it up way faster as compared to other face wash the 100ml tube had a very generous outlet too
clean_review_text: first impression lathers poorly like applying lotion washing well lack foam necessarily mean cleaning skin second impression washing mmm skin feel better try using againfinal impression using good really moisturize skin perfect dry skin specially harsh winter dry sensitive skin need good moisturising skin care routine specially winter months sensitive skin agree random products bought shelf tried 100ml tube herbal liked really moisturize dry skin bought 200ml pack amazon removed star though outlet big generous amount plops single pump end finishing way faster compared face wash 100ml tube generous outlet

name: Himalaya-Moisturizing-Aloe-Vera-200ml

name: Himalaya-Baby-Shampoo-400-ml
review: I bought 100ml pack at local shop to try it and I loved the fragrance and it leaves my baby hair smooth with a lovely lingering smell So I ordered a 400ml pack at Amazon Rs 168 The one I bought at local store is very thick with almost gel like consistency doesn t even spill out even if the cap is open and lying down have to really squeeze it out But the one I bought from Amazon is so watery and runny Spills out in an instant without even squeezing bottle There is no seal on bottle so there s no telling if the content is genuine or tampered with maybe diluted who knows

name: Himalaya-4003F-Baby-Lotion-400ml
review: I ve ordered it 3 times and likely to order again Unlike the 400ml Himalaya gentle baby shampoo or gentle baby bath which has no seals this lotion comes in clear laminated sealed pack and I ve received it in good condition and packing all the 3 times I ordered Although it s tad light it s okay for baby skin I love it s fragrance leaves my baby smelling nice and I use it myself too but it s too light for my dry skin but of course it s meant mainly for babies One winning feature about this particular 400ml pack is it s pump feature makes it lot easier to literally use it singlehandedly which comes in real handy if you ve to hold a squirming wriggling baby with your other hand Update I ve ordered my 9th bottle Initially seller give one bottle but nowadays the minimum quantity is 2 bottles But it s okay your baby is going to use it every day and they come with very good shelf life so you finish them long before it s expiry date
clean_review_text: ordered 3 times likely order unlike 400ml himalaya gentle baby shampoo gentle baby bath seals lotion comes clear laminated sealed pack received good condition packing 3 times ordered although tad light okay baby skin love fragrance leaves baby smelling nice use light dry skin course meant mainly babies one winning feature particular 400ml pack pump feature makes lot easier literally use singlehandedly comes real handy hold squirming wriggling baby hand update ordered 9th bottle initially seller give one bottle nowadays minimum quantity 2 bottles okay baby going use every day come good shelf life finish long expiry date

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I was using Himalaya moisturized 8 years back and my skin was really good soft and gentle After I moved to Hyderabad I moved to different products like Olay Ponds Lotus Maybelline Lakme etc I wasn t happy with any of them but this Anti aging cream is awesome in a weeks time I can see and feel the difference in my skin its very light and light smell Totally like this cream

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I have ordered this product for my Mom And she is very happy with the results after using this product It does works nicely to reduce your wrinkles if you will apply it on daily bases At least use this twice in a day if you really want to improve your skin tone What I liked the most about this product Its fragrance is good Made up with natural ingredients So it won t harm to your skin Comes with a very cheaper price if we will compare to other related brands JUST go for this product if you are suffering from wrinkle problem GO for it Its a value for money product under budget

name: Himalaya-Herbals-Anti-Wrinkle-Cream
review: I got this for my mom because of the reviews and to be honest because of its low price My mom has been applying it with great dedication every night for over 2 months now had it ordered 2 times I can t say I have seen much of a difference The least a cream can do is moisturize but this cream doesn t work as a moisturizer either Again I might be wrong and because my mom has just started using aging creams while she should have started at least some 10 years ago But I would really recommend going with better options And people in the same predicament as mine can you please suggest me creams that might work

name: Society-Tea-Regular-Pouch-1kg
review: I m a milk tea addicted person Although I control it upto thrice day but sometimes it may exceed 5 Since I like milk tea alot I have tried many Dust teas available in the market I ve tried and tasted Wagh bakri brookebond Taj society maharsthra chai maa beti Chai you name it I liked the society tea alot This tea when boiled in the water gives a nice flavor and the color which no other teas can give The packaging was nice I ordered for a 1kg pack directly since I already knew about the taste From the value for money standpoint it is a little costlier 20 30 Rs per kg in comparison to its other teas of its class But you will find it worth it Just make sure you use a correct method to prepare to get the best out of it Method in the sense first boil it in water and then add milk Directly adding into milk will also give you the good taste but the colour will fade away in that case
clean_review_text: milk tea addicted person although control upto thrice day sometimes may exceed 5 since like milk tea alot tried many dust teas available market tried tasted wagh bakri brookebond taj society maharsthra chai maa beti chai name liked society tea alot tea boiled water gives nice flavor color teas give packaging nice ordered 1kg pack directly since already knew taste value money standpoint little costlier 20 30 rs per kg comparison teas class find worth make sure use correct method prepare get best method sense first boil water add milk directly adding milk also give good taste colour fade away case

name: Society-Tea-Masala-Jar-250g
review: Recently I visited a relative in Dubai and tasted Society Masala tea for the 1st time I simply loved it more so when I found real ingredients like cinnamon cardamom ginger etc written on the box I ordered same tea in india once I got back and I am shocked to see that there are no real ingredients The box says there are added flovors only How disgusting to find that what is sold in india and exported abroad is totally different I wish I could return the tea but unfortunately Amazon does not accept return of food items

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: It is strong and tastes very good After trying almost 10 different brands of tea I have found the one I like I have tried Taj Mahal Red label RCM and many different others I like my tea strong and for that you don t have to add too much of this tea It is not just too strong tea it tastes good Most in my family like it and this is the one we are going to use from now on along with Red Label for those who like Red Label more And Amazon from time to time provides good discounts on products and makes them affordable for all Btw it sells for 355 next door mall when Amazon is selling it for 385 I know shipping costs so it is ok

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky everyone has their own preferences Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea For the purpose of making milk tea this particular brand is quite good a strong combination of good colour definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that s firm but not too overpowering This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider If you re the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you re looking for It s price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many That said if you enjoy that one good cup a day it s a worthy buy in My recommendation certainly worth a try especially if you like a good developed flavour in your cuppa

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: Reviewing CTC tea can be tricky everyone has their own preferences Flavour profiles that one has become accustomed to often determines how one reacts to a new tea For the purpose of making milk tea this particular brand is quite good a strong combination of good colour definitely pleasing fragrance and taste that s firm but not too overpowering This is a good option for someone used to tee leaves made by the likes of Wagh Bakri This has slightly more liquor to it than the Wagh Bakhri and the fragrance spectrum is a bit wider If you re the type who likes your Tata Agni and similar robust and bolder tea leaves then this may not be what you re looking for It s price point is on the higher side and may be a factor for many That said if you enjoy that one good cup a day it s a worthy buy in My recommendation certainly worth a try especially if you like a good developed flavour in your cuppa
clean_review_text: reviewing ctc tea tricky everyone preferences flavour profiles one become accustomed often determines one reacts new tea purpose making milk tea particular brand quite good strong combination good colour definitely pleasing fragrance taste firm overpowering good option someone used tee leaves made likes wagh bakri slightly liquor wagh bakhri fragrance spectrum bit wider type likes tata agni similar robust bolder tea leaves may looking price point higher side may factor many said enjoy one good cup day worthy buy recommendation certainly worth try especially like good developed flavour cuppa

name: Tata-Tea-Gold-500g
review: I was using Red label since ages and some time back switched to Tata Gold tea for some reason I must say Tata gold is way cheaper and tests much batter than Red Label Also quantity required to make a cup of tea is lesser compared to Red Label These are my reasons to switch to Tata Gold 1 Because of the controversial advertising by Red Label where they said that people go to Kumbh Mela to abandon their old age parents Thse MNCs come to India make money from us and than mock us this should not be tolerated 2 To support Indian Brands like Tata Patanjali Dabur etc
